name: Sedum Acre stonecrop
description: Sedum Acre, also known as Goldmoss Stonecrop, is a low-growing, hardy succulent with tiny, bright green leaves that form dense mats, making it perfect as ground cover. In summer, it produces small, cheerful yellow star-shaped flowers that add a splash of color to any space. This plant is very easy to grow and requires minimal care, thriving in full sun Sedum Acre is ideal for gardens, pots, hanging baskets, and even green roofs, adding a vibrant, lush touch with very little maintenance.
